properties.areaDesc: Upper Tanana Valley and the Fortymile Country
properties.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued February 16 at 2:28PM AKST until February 17 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Expect wind chills as
cold as 50 below zero.

* WHERE...Upper Tanana Valley and the Fortymile Country.

* WHEN...Until noon Monday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The cold wind chills will cause frostbite
in as little as 10 minutes to exposed skin.
properties.instruction:
A Wind Chill Advisory means that cold air and sustained wind
speeds of 15 mph or more will create low wind chills. Frost bite
and hypothermia can occur if precautions are not taken.

NWSheadline: WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST MONDAY
